statements: DELETE FROM budget_allocation WHERE program_code = 123 AND allocation_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM budget_allocation WHERE program_name = 'Education' AND program_code = 456 AND allocated_amount >= 1000.00;
DELETE FROM program_expenses WHERE expense_id IN (SELECT expense_id FROM program_expenses WHERE expense_category='Travel');
DELETE FROM budget_changes WHERE program_id = 3 AND change_date = '2023-05-15';
DELETE FROM program_expenses WHERE program_id = 2001 AND expense_amount < 5000;
DELETE FROM transaction WHERE department_id = 200 AND amount_spent > 1000;
DELETE FROM budget_allocation WHERE program_id = 5 AND allocated_amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM program_categories WHERE program_id = 1 AND category_id = 2;
DELETE FROM program_expenditures WHERE expenditure_amount > 500 AND expenditure_date < '2022-01-01';
